name: Shiv Nadar University
description: The Shiv Nadar Institution of Eminence is a multidisciplinary, student-centric research university established in 2011 by Shiv Nadar, one of India’s foremost philanthropists and a pioneer of technological revolution. It has four Schools, viz., Engineering, Natural Sciences, Humanities and Social Sciences, Management & Entrepreneurship, and the Academy of Continuing Education. We were the first university in the country to offer a 4-year multidisciplinary research degree. Today, we are continuing as trailblazers with new kinds of curriculum, championed by faculty drawn from some of the top institutions in the country and the world. With low faculty-student ratios, their in-depth attention to students lead to high levels of student success.

enhanced_description: The Shiv Nadar Institution of Eminence, established in 2011 by Shiv Nadar, is a multidisciplinary, student-centric research university. It aims to bring a paradigm shift in higher education in India through its innovative curriculum, interdisciplinary focus, and cross-disciplinary thinking across its four Schools: Engineering, Natural Sciences, Humanities and Social Sciences, and Management & Entrepreneurship, along with the Academy of Continuing Education. As the first university in the country to offer a 4-year multidisciplinary research degree, it continues as a trailblazer with new kinds of curriculum, championed by faculty drawn from top institutions globally. The university maintains low faculty-student ratios, ensuring in-depth attention to students, which leads to high levels of student success. Its core objectives include accelerating skill development and learning efficiency, with a strong focus on innovation and research, ultimately fostering global leaders through interdisciplinary learning.
